title: Derive Nicod's axiom from the standard axioms
content: Prove Nicod's axiom and implication and negation definitions.

blocks.name: nic-dfim
blocks.content: This theorem "defines" implication in terms of 'nand'. Analogous to ~ nanim . In a pure (standalone) treatment of Nicod's axiom, this theorem would be changed to a definition ($a statement). (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-dfneg
blocks.content: This theorem "defines" negation in terms of 'nand'. Analogous to ~ nannot . In a pure (standalone) treatment of Nicod's axiom, this theorem would be changed to a definition ($a statement). (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-mp
blocks.content: Derive Nicod's rule of modus ponens using 'nand', from the standard one. Although the major and minor premise together also imply ` ch ` , this form is necessary for useful derivations from ~ nic-ax . In a pure (standalone) treatment of Nicod's axiom, this theorem would be changed to an axiom ($a statement). (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 19-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-mpALT
blocks.content: A direct proof of ~ nic-mp . (Contributed by NM, 30-Dec-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nic-mpALT(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- w0
  -| w1
  -| wnan(w1, wnan(w2, w0))
} = {
  ax-mp(w0, w1)
  simprd(w1, w0, w2)
  mpbir(wi(w1, wa(w2, w0)), wn(wa(w1, wn(wa(w2, w0)))))
  mpbi(wn(wa(w1, wn(wa(w2, w0)))), wnan(w1, wnan(w2, w0)))
  xchbinx(wnan(w1, wnan(w2, w0)), wa(w1, wn(wa(w2, w0))), wa(w1, wnan(w2, w0)))
  df-nan(w1, wnan(w2, w0))
  anbi2i(w1, wnan(w2, w0), wn(wa(w2, w0)))
  df-nan(w2, w0)
  iman(w1, wa(w2, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nic-mpALT(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ w0
  ⊣ w1
  ⊣ (w1 ⊼(w2 ⊼ w0))
} = {
  ax-mp(w0, w1)
  simprd(w1, w0, w2)
  mpbir((w1 →(w2 ∧ w0)), ¬(w1 ∧ ¬(w2 ∧ w0)))
  mpbi(¬(w1 ∧ ¬(w2 ∧ w0)), (w1 ⊼(w2 ⊼ w0)))
  xchbinx((w1 ⊼(w2 ⊼ w0)), (w1 ∧ ¬(w2 ∧ w0)), (w1 ∧(w2 ⊼ w0)))
  df-nan(w1, (w2 ⊼ w0))
  anbi2i(w1, (w2 ⊼ w0), ¬(w2 ∧ w0))
  df-nan(w2, w0)
  iman(w1, (w2 ∧ w0))
}

blocks.name: nic-ax
blocks.content: Nicod's axiom derived from the standard ones. See _Introduction to Mathematical Philosophy_ by B. Russell, p. 152. Like ~ meredith , the usual axioms can be derived from this and vice versa. Unlike ~ meredith , Nicod uses a different connective ('nand'), so another form of modus ponens must be used in proofs, e.g. ` { ` ~ nic-ax , ~ nic-mp ` } ` is equivalent to ` { ` ~ luk-1 , ~ luk-2 , ~ luk-3 , ~ ax-mp ` } ` . In a pure (standalone) treatment of Nicod's axiom, this theorem would be changed to an axiom ($a statement). (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 19-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nic-ax(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))))
} = {
  mpbir(wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))))), wi(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wa(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))))))
  jctil(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))))
  3syl(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w1))
  biimpi(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)))
  nannan(w0, w1, w2)
  imim2i(w0, wa(w1, w2), w1)
  simpl(w1, w2)
  sylib(wi(w0, w1), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))), wi(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(w0, w4)))
  syl5bir(wi(w0, w1), wnan(w4, w1), wnan(w0, w4), wi(w4, wn(w1)))
  bitr4i(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wnan(w4, w1), wn(wa(w4, w1)))
  imnan(w4, w1)
  df-nan(w4, w1)
  syl6ibr(wi(w0, w1), wi(w4, wn(w1)), wnan(w0, w4), wi(w4, wn(w0)))
  imim2d(wi(w0, w1), w4, wn(w1), wn(w0))
  con3(w0, w1)
  3bitr4ri(wnan(w0, w4), wi(w4, wn(w0)), wi(w0, wn(w4)), wn(wa(w0, w4)))
  imnan(w0, w4)
  con2b(w4, w0)
  df-nan(w0, w4)
  nanim(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(w0, w4))
  mpbir(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)))
  biimpi(w3, wa(w3, w3))
  pm4.24(w3)
  nannan(w3, w3, w3)
  nannan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))))
}

blocks.name: nic-axALT
blocks.content: A direct proof of ~ nic-ax . (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nic-axALT(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))))
} = {
  mpbir(wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))))), wn(wa(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))))))
  mpbir(wn(wa(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))))), wi(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))))))
  jctil(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))))
  syl(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))), wi(w0, w1))
  imim2i(w0, wa(w1, w2), w1)
  simpl(w1, w2)
  imim2d(wi(w0, w1), w4, wn(w1), wn(w0))
  con3(w0, w1)
  biimpri(w3, wa(w3, w3))
  anidm(w3)
  bitr4i(wn(wa(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))))), wi(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))))), wn(wa(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wn(wa(wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))))))))
  notbii(wa(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))))), wa(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wn(wa(wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0)))))))
  anbi12i(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wn(wa(wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))))))
  3bitr4i(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wn(wa(w0, wnan(w1, w2))), wn(wa(w0, wn(wa(w1, w2)))))
  notbii(wa(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wa(w0, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
  anbi2i(w0, wnan(w1, w2), wn(wa(w1, w2)))
  df-nan(w1, w2)
  df-nan(w0, wnan(w1, w2))
  iman(w0, wa(w1, w2))
  xchbinx(wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))), wa(wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0)))), wa(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))))
  df-nan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))))
  anbi12i(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))), wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))))
  3bitr4i(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wn(wa(w3, wnan(w3, w3))), wn(wa(w3, wn(wa(w3, w3)))))
  notbii(wa(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wa(w3, wn(wa(w3, w3))))
  anbi2i(w3, wnan(w3, w3), wn(wa(w3, w3)))
  df-nan(w3, w3)
  df-nan(w3, wnan(w3, w3))
  iman(w3, wa(w3, w3))
  3bitr4i(wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0))), wn(wa(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))), wn(wa(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wn(wi(w4, wn(w0))))))
  notbii(wa(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))), wa(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wn(wi(w4, wn(w0)))))
  anbi12i(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)), wi(w4, wn(w1)), wn(wi(w4, wn(w0))))
  bitr4i(wnan(w4, w1), wi(w4, wn(w1)), wn(wa(w4, w1)))
  df-nan(w4, w1)
  imnan(w4, w1)
  xchbinx(wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)), wi(w4, wn(w0)), wa(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))
  df-nan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4))
  3bitri(wa(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)), wi(w4, wn(w0)), wnan(w0, w4), wn(wa(w0, w4)))
  anidm(wnan(w0, w4))
  df-nan(w0, w4)
  bitr3i(wn(wa(w0, w4)), wi(w4, wn(w0)), wi(w0, wn(w4)))
  imnan(w0, w4)
  con2b(w0, w4)
  df-nan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))
  iman(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0)))
  iman(wi(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wi(w3, wa(w3, w3)), wi(wi(w4, wn(w1)), wi(w4, wn(w0)))))
  df-nan(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w2)), wnan(wnan(w3, wnan(w3, w3)), wnan(wnan(w4, w1), wnan(wnan(w0, w4), wnan(w0, w4)))))
}
